Computer Vision.description: Focuses on the analysis and interpretation of image and video data, encompassing tasks such as image classification and object detection.

Natural Language Processing.description: Engages in the processing and comprehension of textual data, commonly applied in tasks such as information extraction, sentiment analysis, and text generation.

Cross-Modal Processing.description: Concerns the processing of data across different modalities, including text-image integration and multimodal learning.

Signal Processing.description: Involves the analysis and manipulation of signal data, including audio and biomedical signals.

Sequential Modeling.description: Addresses the modeling and analysis of time series or other sequential data.

Recommender Systems.description: Focuses on the development of systems that recommend products or content based on user behavior and preferences.

Reinforcement Learning.description: Investigates how agents learn optimal policies through interactions with their environment.

Graph Learning.description: Centers on the learning and analysis of graph-structured data.

Anomaly Detection.description: Primarily focused on identifying anomalies or outliers within data sets.

Security and Privacy.description: Examines data security and privacy issues, such as cybersecurity and AI security, with an emphasis on attack and defense algorithms.

General Machine Learning.description: Covers a range of generalizable tasks in machine learning that do not specify a particular application, such as regression, classification, feature selection, and representation learning.
